class_notes: HPM students only. Course meets In-Person Monday 10:00am - 11:50am and Online synchronously Monday 2:00pm - 2:50pm.
course_description: Introduces basic supply and demand concepts applied to health care markets, using microeconomic theory. Topics of discussion include what does or does not make health care distinctive as an economic good, the market for health care in theory and practice, and economic proposals to overcome existing market failure.
prerequisites: This class is for HPMMPH or HPMMSPH students only.
sections: Class Nbr: 1575, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 10-11:50a; M 2-2:50p, Instructor: V. Phillips, Status: Open
